ComicInfo.Title: 4000 Holes in Forest Park!
ComicInfo.Summary: 4000 Holes in Forest Park!: In an attempt to discover the secret behind the prophecy of the return of Kometes, Daimon, Katherine and Byron travel to the past to Atlantis.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-20 20:12:21. [CVDB14430] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:53:38. [Issue ID 27574]
ComicInfo.Letterer: Charlotte Jetter,Gaspar Saladino,C. Jetter,Gaspar Saladino,C. Jetter
ComicInfo.Characters: Daimon Hellstrom,Katherine Reynolds,Detective Alex Quinn (first appearance),Byron Hyatt,Kometes (first appearance, villain, a fiery serpent),Daniel Allen Crandall (first appearance),The Legion of Nihilists (first appearance, villains)
ComicInfo.Teams: Atlanteans,City of St. Louis,Nazis,Dragons,Legion Of Nihilists,Metropolitan Police Department
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
